lora_url.description: URL to LoRA file (.safetensors) or Civitai model page
lora_url.title: Lora Url

negative_prompt.default: oversaturated, overexposed, static, blurry details, subtitles, stylized, artwork, painting, still image, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG artifacts, ugly, deformed, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, malformed, disfigured, deformed limbs, fused fingers, static motionless frame, cluttered background, three legs, crowded background, walking backwards
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to guide what to avoid in generation
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt

cache_threshold.description: Cache threshold for transformer (0 to disable caching)
cache_threshold.title: Cache Threshold

cache_threshold_2.description: Cache threshold for transformer_2 (0 to disable caching)
cache_threshold_2.title: Cache Threshold 2

boundary_ratio.description: Boundary ratio for dual transformer setup (0.0-1.0, higher values give more steps to high noise transformer)
boundary_ratio.title: Boundary Ratio

loras.description: List of LoRA configs to apply
loras.title: Loras
